snippet: A team in England said that it had taken a step toward bringing improved security to computer networks, developing a technique that will extend protection to a group of users.
abstract: Scientific researchers in England, in paper published in journal Nature, say they have taken a step toward bringing improved security to computer networks; are developing an encryption technique that will extend protection to a group of computer users.
lead_paragraph: A team in England said that it had taken a step toward bringing improved security to computer networks, developing a technique that will extend protection to a group of users.

headline.main: Scientists Expand Scale of Digital Snooping Alert
headline.print_headline: Scientists Expand Scale Of Digital Snooping Alert

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
